# peakHoldLevel

**Instance Property**

The peak hold power level in decibels.

## Declaration

```swift
var peakHoldLevel: Float { get }
```

## Discussion

This property isn’t key-value observable.

## Accessing power levels

- **averagePowerLevel**: The instantaneous average power level in decibels.
